ius.title: Survey
ius.prompt: This questionnaire is designed to measure intolerance of uncertainty. Please answer the following questions as honestly as you can. There are no right or wrong answers, and there are no trick questions.

statements.name: frustration
statements.prompt: It frustrates me not having all the information I need.

statements.name: full_life
statements.prompt: Uncertainty keeps me from living a full life.

statements.name: surprise_avoid
statements.prompt: One should always look ahead so as to avoid surprises.

statements.name: unforeseen_spoil
statements.prompt: A small unforeseen event can spoil everything, even with the best of planning.

statements.name: uncertainty_paralysis
statements.prompt: When it's time to act, uncertainty paralyzes me.

statements.name: uncertainty_malfunction
statements.prompt: When I am uncertain I can't function very well.

statements.name: future
statements.prompt: I always want to know what the future has in store of me.

statements.name: surprise_intolerance
statements.prompt: I can't stand being taken by surprise

statements.name: doubt_paralysis
statements.prompt: The smallest doubt can stop me from acting.

statements.name: organize
statements.prompt: I should be able to organize everything in advance.

statements.name: escape
statements.prompt: I must get away from all uncertain situations.

options: Not at all characteristic of me

trials.conclusion: The experiment has concluded. Thank you for participating.
